testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed And user clicks on Login after navigating to My Account menu................passed And user enters "admin123@gmail.com" and "admin@123"........................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user navigates to My Account page......................................passed

testcase.name: login with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed And user clicks on Login after navigating to My Account menu................passed And user enters "admin@gmail.com" and "admin@123"...........................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user should not navigate to My Account page............................passed
